para.text: "HWI grant" means the grant awarded to the Intermediary pursuant to § 32-1682.
"Intermediary" means the entity selected to be the Healthcare Workforce Intermediary pursuant to § 32-1682.
"Partnership" means the Healthcare Workforce Partnership established pursuant to § 32-1684.
"Training" means occupational skills training for occupations in the healthcare sector.
"WIOA" means the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act, approved July 22, 2014 (128 Stat. 1425; 29 U.S.C. § 3101 et seq.).
